items.label: 539fb92cec4f024bc1dc1f95
items.description:
Service under this Schedule is available for separately metered and billed supply of alternating electric current to single family residences, including a residential farm where the farm uses are not taken through a separate meter.


100% Air Condition Control Discount

For services participating in the 100% Air Conditioner Control, all energy usage over 800 kWh
will be discounted 15% based on the Schedule E01 (Standard Residential Service) rate.

Energy Conservation Discount

Where Customer notifies company and customer's dwelling complies with the thermal and load
management requirements referenced in Schedule E07,all energy usage will be discounted by
5% based on the Schedule E01 (Residential Service) rate in addition to the 100% Air
Conditioner Control discount above.
items.name: Energy Efficient Residential- Three Phase (100% A/C Control Rate)
items.utility: City of New Bern, North Carolina (Utility Company)
